name: faker-test-1-single
description: E2E Test 1: Single agent with real AWS CloudWatch MCP wrapped by faker

args: Simulate AWS CloudWatch experiencing high CPU crisis. When get_metric_data is called for EC2 CPU metrics, return realistic time series showing sudden spike from 20% baseline to 95% sustained load over past 6 hours. When analyze_metric is called, detect the anomaly and identify it started at 2 AM UTC. When get_active_alarms is called, show ALARM state for CPUUtilization threshold breach. Include proper AWS metric structure with timestamps, dimensions (InstanceId), namespace (AWS/EC2), and statistic values.
